home-ecosystem-subtitle: Get started in 3 steps to dive into the world of BNB Chain.
home-ecosystem-download-desc: A wallet helps you connect to BNB Chain and manage your funds.
home-ecosystem-getbnb-desc: BNB is the currency of BNB Chain - you can use it in dApps
home-ecosystem-dapp-desc: Discover the hottest projects on BNB Chain.
home-build-desc: BNB Smart Chain (BSC) supports the most popular programming languages, flexible tools, and comes with clear and canonical documentation. You can quickly start and deploy your application on a blockchain designed with real use in mind.
home-build-evm-desc: The best-performing EVM compatible layer 1. Fully compatible tooling for EVM with up to 35 times of capacity.
home-build-user-desc: Handling the largest daily active users and the highest peak EVM transactions with economical fees.
home-build-api-desc: Full support on all popular tokens via the most powerful Binance Bridge. The greatest opportunity for composability.
home-build-eco-desc: Supported by a robust ecosystem of top-tier RPC plants, wallets, blockchain explorers, data indices, and substantial grants.
home-mvb-desc: BNB Chain Developer Grant Program funds development teams aimed at decentralizing, growing, and securing the BNB Chain ecosystem. Apply for funds to help make your project a success.
home-bas-desc: BNB Sidechain is an infrastructure introduced to help developers and the application community to build and run their dedicated blockchain as a focused value system for a massive number of users while still maintaining a close connection with BNB Chain.
home-bas-dedication-desc: A blockchain dedicated to the application logic with the independent community governance and economy.
home-bas-sus-desc: BNB Sidechain is a high-performance blockchain with high TPS and ultra-low gas fees.
home-bas-integration-desc: Projects that own a BNB Sidechain are also a part of the broader BNB Chain ecosystem.
home-bas-support-desc: BNB Sidechain is backed by the largest community of users and developers.
home-community-title-1: Get Involved, Be Part of the
home-community-desc: BNB Chain is a global, decentralized network with developers, validators, users, HODLers and enthusiasts.
home-eco-modal-transfer-desc: On most crypto exchanges, like Binance, you can purchase BNB then transfer them to your wallet address.
home-eco-modal-wallet-desc: Some wallets let you buy crypto with a debit/credit card. Please try your own wallet or download one.
home-eco-modal-connect-desc: Buy BNB with your debit/credit cards.
